technology: There were some audio issues at the beginning of the video, but it was resolved quickly.
cur_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect about the pandemic, but it is not extreme.
past_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, such as having to shut down her business.
communal_orientation: The participant is talking and asking questions but not giving affirmations, but seems somewhat engaged.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversing with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant is not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are somewhat important.
booster_importance: The participant does not believe that boosters are very important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity.
general_notes: The participant had a unique experience with COVID, as she was in China when the pandemic started.
